title: U.S. fire statistics : fire department responses , by type of call 2018
summary: The U.S. fire Type in the fire department was Type False_alarms , who made 23551.5 calls .
The most fire Type was Fire_incidents , with just 426.0 calls .

In second place was Type All_other_responses_(smoke_scares_lock-outs_etc.) with 6342.5 calls ; third place went to Type Medical_aid_responses_(ambulance_EMS_rescue) with 23551.5 calls ; fourth place went to Type Hazardous_material_responses_(Spills_Leaks_etc.) with 426.0 calls and fifth place went to Type Mutual_aid_or_assistance , who was 1512.5 calls .

data.Type of call: All other responses (smoke scares lock-outs etc.)
Other hazardous responses (arcing wires bomb removal etc.)

gold: This statistic shows total number of calls responded by fire departments of the United States in 2018 . In 2018 , U.S. fire departments responded to 2,889,000 false alarms . This was an increase of 13 % from the previous year .
